TEXT.English: Less experience needed for unit promotions; extra food from Paddy Fields; extra commerce from Windmills and Watermills; extra commerce from specialists
TEXT.Chinese: 单位晋升需要经验减少；稻田提供额外食物；风力磨坊和水力磨坊提供额外商业；专家提供额外商业

TEXT.English: Double production speed for Libraries, Aqueducts, Theatres and Markets; can spend gold to finish unit production
TEXT.Chinese: 图书馆、水渠、剧院和市场的双重生产速度；可以用黄金完成单位生产

TEXT.English: Increased commerce in capital; extra commerce from Workshops, Plantations and Slave Plantations; double production speed for Customs House
TEXT.Chinese: 首都商业增长；工厂、种植园和奴隶种植园提供额外商业；海关建造速度加倍

TEXT.English: Increased growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra commerce from Villages and Towns
TEXT.Chinese: 村舍、小村庄和村庄的增长速度加快；小镇提供额外商业

TEXT.English: Extra experience for land units; reduced growth rate for Cottages, Hamlets and Villages; extra gold on city conquest
TEXT.Chinese: 陆地单位提供额外经验；村舍、小村庄和村庄的增长速度降低；城市征服带来额外黄金

TEXT.English: Increased building production in cities with state religion
TEXT.Chinese: 信仰国教的城市建筑产能增加

TEXT.English: Extra trade route in all cities; extra happiness from Oasis
TEXT.Chinese: 所有城市存在额外贸易路线；绿洲提供额外快乐

TEXT.English: Extra free specialist in all cities; no foreign trade routes; increased espionage in capital
TEXT.Chinese: 所有城市都有额外的免费专家；没有外贸路线；首都间谍点数增加

TEXT.English: Can capture Workers; extra production from Quarries; extra commerce from Mines and Plantations
TEXT.Chinese: 能捕获工人；采石场提供额外生产；矿山和种植园提供额外商业

TEXT.English: Extra happiness from military units; reduced maintenance from distance to Palace; double production speed for Jails
TEXT.Chinese: 军队带来的额外快乐；距离维护费；监狱的生产速度加倍

TEXT.English: Cities with state religion give extra experience; no spread of non-state religions; Increased unit production in cities with state religion
TEXT.Chinese: 提供两个牧师空位；有国家宗教的城市提供额外的经验；没有非国教宗教的传播

TEXT.English: Faster improvement construction; extra food from Plantations
TEXT.Chinese: 加快改善建设；种植园的额外食物

TEXT.English: Extra commerce from tiles without improvement; extra commerce from camps and pastures; double production speed for Palace
TEXT.Chinese: 砖瓦加价，不改进；营地和牧场加价；宫殿加倍生产速度

TEXT.English: Reduced unhappiness from corporations; extra commerce from excess happiness; extra commerce from Windmills, Nature Preserves and Marine Preserves; can spend gold to finish building production
TEXT.Chinese: 减少来自公司的不快；额外的商业来自额外的快乐；额外的商业来自风车、自然保护区和海洋保护区；可以花费黄金完成建筑生产

TEXT.English: Additional units without upkeep; extra happiness in largest cities; extra production from Farms
TEXT.Chinese: 无需维护费的额外单位；大城市存在额外幸福；农场提供额外生产

TEXT.English: No state religion; increased science in all cities; extra happiness from non-state religions; double production speed for Hospitals, Universities, Observatories, Laboratories and Supercomputers; can build wonders that require a state religion
TEXT.Chinese: 没有国教；所有城市都增加了科研；非国教宗教带来了额外的快乐；医院、大学、天文台、实验室和超级计算机的建造速度加倍；可以建造需要国教的奇观

TEXT.English: Extra commerce in capital from vassal cities; military units are produced with food; extra commerce from trade routes
TEXT.Chinese: 附庸城市在首都存在额外贸易；生产军队时食物提供产能；贸易路线带来额外贸易

TEXT.English: Faster military unit production; no war weariness; extra production from unhappy population; no unrest on city conquest
TEXT.Chinese: 军事单位生产更快；没有战争带来的不愉快；不愉快人口带来额外生产；城市征服没有动乱

TEXT.English: Increased great people birth rate in cities with state religion; Double available slots for priests; at least one slot for priests
TEXT.Chinese: 信仰国教的城市伟人出生率增加

TEXT.English: Double available slots for artists, scientists and engineers; extra research from specialists; cannot use slaves
TEXT.Chinese: 为艺术家、科学家和工程师提供两个空位；专家提供额外研究；不能使用奴隶

TEXT.English: Increased great general birth rate; no temporary unhappiness; extra production from Workshops and Lumbermills; extra happiness from News Press and Broadcasting Tower
TEXT.Chinese: 提高大军事家的出生率；消除暂时的不愉快；工坊和伐木场提供额外生产；新闻媒体和广播塔提供额外快乐

TEXT.English: Can draft units; extra production from Towns
TEXT.Chinese: 能征召单位；小镇存在额外产能

TEXT.English: Extra production from specialists; extra food from Workshops and Watermills; extra commerce from Mines and Watermills; double production speed for Factories, Coal Plants, Hydro Plants, Electrical Grids and Automated Factories
TEXT.Chinese: 专家的额外生产；来自工坊和水力磨坊的额外食物；来自矿山和水力磨坊的额外商业；工厂、煤电厂、水电厂、电网和自动化工厂的建造速度加倍

TEXT.English: Extra food from specialists; reduced food from farms, plantations, cottages, hamlets, villages and towns; at least one slot for artists, scientists, merchants and statesmen
TEXT.Chinese: 专家提供额外食物；农场、种植园、农舍、小村庄、村庄和城镇减少的食物；至少为艺术家、科学家、商人和政治家提供一个位置

TEXT.English: Extra experience for air units; extra yield from trade routes with defensive pact partners; trade routes yield production; extra war weariness; cannot use slaves
TEXT.Chinese: 空军的额外经验；与防御协定伙伴的贸易路线产生的额外收益；贸易路线产生的生产；额外的厌战；不能使用奴隶

TEXT.English: Extra commerce in capital from colonies; extra production and commerce for Slave Plantations; extra experience for water units; can capture slaves
TEXT.Chinese: 殖民地首都存在额外贸易；奴隶种植带来额外产能和贸易；水面单位带来额外经验；可以捕获奴隶

TEXT.English: Can hurry unit production by sacrificing population
TEXT.Chinese: 牺牲人口就能加快单位生产

TEXT.English: Increased food in capital; reduced commerce from trade routes; increased production speed for Granaries
TEXT.Chinese: 首都粮食增加；贸易路线上的贸易减少；粮仓建造速度加快

TEXT.English: Double available slots for merchants; increased commerce from trade routes; increased commerce from corporations
TEXT.Chinese: 为商人提供两个空位；通过贸易路线增加贸易；通过公司增加贸易

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can build wonders regardless of State [ICON_RELIGION] requirements
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]可以建造奇观，无视国教 [ICON_RELIGION]要求

TEXT.English: Increased production and gold in capital
TEXT.Chinese: 在首都提高收入和产能

TEXT.English: Extra free specialist in all cities; double available slots for statesmen; double production speed for Courthouses
TEXT.Chinese: 所有城市都有额外的免费专家；为政治家提供两个名额；法院建造速度加倍

TEXT.English: Extra happiness from non-state religions; increased culture in capital; can train missionaries without monasteries; halved diplomatic penalties from state religion differences
TEXT.Chinese: 来自非国家宗教的额外幸福；首都文化的增长；可以培训没有修道院的传教士

TEXT.English: No maintenance costs from number of cities; extra espionage from specialists
TEXT.Chinese: 没有城市数量维护费；专家提供额外间谍点数

TEXT.English: Reduced worker cost; extra production from Pastures; extra commerce from Farms and Orchards
TEXT.Chinese: 降低工人成本；牧场提供额外生产；农场和果园提供额外贸易

TEXT.English: Increased wonder production speed; extra unhappiness from state religion; extra happiness from Pagan Temples
TEXT.Chinese: 奇迹生产速度加快；国教带来额外不快；异教寺庙带来额外幸福
